casebody.data:
Therese A. Infante
v.
Bank of America, N.A. Successor by Merger to BAC Home Loans Servicing, LP f/k/a Countrywide Home Loans Servicing, LP36 NO. 902 MAL 2015 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania May 17, 2016 Appeal from the Superior Court.

Disposition: Denied.

Justice WECHT did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
